# Foundation

## Large Language Models

Large language models are a new paradigm in NLP. They are trained on large amounts of text data and can be used for a variety of tasks. They are also known as pre-trained language models. The most popular ones are BERT, GPT-2, GPT-3, T5, and XLNet. <span style="color: red;">[Find Sources]</span>
